title: Big Bar Reaction Ferry
description: Big Bar Reaction Ferry. Travel advisory in effect at Big Bar Reaction Ferry (Big Bar Reaction Ferry). Road closed for the season. The Aerial Car is in operation for foot traffic only. Next update time Fri May 30, 2025. Last updated Tue Nov 19 at 9:13 AM PST. (DBC-70341)
Description: Road closed for the season. The Aerial Car is in operation for foot traffic only.

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Bridge maintenance between Mt Sicker Rd and Fuller Lake Rd for 3.7 km (Chemainus). Lane closures in both directions. Construction speed zone in effect. Southbound bridge closed for repairs. All Traffic diverted onto the adjacent bridge. No overwidth protocols in effect up to 4.4m. Next update time Mon Jan 20, 2025 at 7:00 AM PST. Last updated Fri Nov 29 at 9:22 PM PST. (DBC-70685)

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Construction work between Coburn St and Shuswap Ave for 0.7 km (Chase). From 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM PST on weekdays and Saturday. Blasting. Road closed intermittently. Watch for traffic control. Speed reduction to 60km/hr. Next update time Sun Dec 15 at 10:00 AM PST. Last updated Mon Nov 25 at 10:06 AM PST. (DBC-64961)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), between Coburn St and Shuswap Ave for 0.7 km (Chase)
Description: Construction work, blasting. Road closed intermittently. Watch for traffic control. Speed reduction to 60km/hr.

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Construction work between Old Sicamous Rd and Solsqua-Sicamous Rd for 2.0 km (Sicamous). From 9:00 AM to 3:00 PM PST on weekdays and Saturday. Bridge closed. Full closure 9AM-3PM Daily + Saturdays. Alternate route via Hwy 97A (Sicamous) / 97B (Salmon Arm) Single lane alternating traffic from 8PM-6AM PST, expect 20 minute delays. Next update time Fri Dec 6 at 3:00 PM PST. Last updated Fri Nov 29 at 3:03 PM PST. (DBC-70490)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), between Old Sicamous Rd and Solsqua-Sicamous Rd, Sicamous, BC
Description: Construction work for 2.0 km. Bridge closed. Full closure 9AM-3PM Daily + Saturdays. Alternate route via Hwy 97A (Sicamous) / 97B (Salmon Arm). Single lane alternating traffic from 8PM-6AM PST, expect 20 minute delays.

title: Highway 1
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway). Avalanche control work planned between Illecillewaet Brake Check and Lanark Snowshed for 4.4 km (1 to 5 km west of West Boundary of Glacier National Park). Starting Thu Dec 5 at 12:00 PM PST until Thu Dec 5 at 2:00 PM PST. Watch for traffic control personnel. Detour will not be available. Expect Road closures up to 20mins. Next update time Thu Dec 5 at 1:45 PM PST. Last updated Wed Dec 4 at 8:50 AM PST. (DBC-70811)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway) between Illecillewaet Brake Check and Lanark Snowshed, 1 to 5 km west of West Boundary of Glacier National Park
Description: Avalanche control work for 4.4 km stretch

title: Highway 17 Both Directions
description: Highway 17 (Patricia Bay Highway), in both directions. Construction work at Exit 18: Keating Cross Rd (Central Saanich). Until Tue Jul 1, 2025. Nighttime lane closures both directions. Access to Barbara Drive from Keating Cross Road and access to East Saanich, Martindale and Danica from Highway 17 permanently closed. Keating Cross Road southbound onramp to Highway 17 closed. Next update time Sat May 10, 2025 at 12:00 PM PDT. Last updated Thu Sep 26 at 12:08 PM PDT. (DBC-54341)

title: Highway 99 Both Directions
description: Highway 99, in both directions. Construction work planned at Exit 32: Steveston Hwy (Richmond). Starting Thu Dec 5 at 11:00 PM PST until Fri Dec 6 at 5:00 AM PST. Road closure planned. Detour planned. Watch for traffic control personnel. Traffic will be detoured up and over the existing on- and off-ramps. Next update time Fri Dec 6 at 5:00 AM PST. Last updated Wed Dec 4 at 3:08 PM PST. (DBC-70824)
Location: Highway 99, in both directions at Exit 32: Steveston Hwy (Richmond)
Description: Construction work planned. Road closure planned. Detour planned. Watch for traffic control personnel. Traffic will be detoured up and over the existing on- and off-ramps.

title: Kootenay Lake Ferry Both Directions
description: Kootenay Lake Ferry, in both directions. Ferry is out of service between Balfour and Kootenay Bay. Schedule modification. Mon-Fri essential service Balfour sailings: 6:30AM, 8:10AM, 4:30PM, Kootenay Bay: 7:10AM, 9AM, 5:20PM. Sat-Sun Balfour sailings: 6:30AM, 9:40PM, Kootenay Bay: 7:10AM, 10:20PM. Essential service travelers board 1st, then general public. Emergency services accommodated. Next update time Fri Dec 6 at 9:00 AM PST. Last updated Wed Dec 4 at 8:16 AM PST. (DBC-69872)

title: Other Roads
description: Kersley-Dale Landing Rd. Landslide at 500 metres in from Highway 97 Intersection. Road closed. A temporary Single Lane Gravel Road for Local Traffic via Arnoldus Road. Next update time Mon Dec 9 at 9:00 AM PDT. Last updated Thu Aug 8 at 9:26 AM PDT. (DBC-23443)
Location: Kersley-Dale Landing Rd. at 500 metres in from Highway 97 Intersection
Description: Landslide, road closed. Temporary Single Lane Gravel Road for Local Traffic via Arnoldus Road.

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: Durrell Road, in both directions. Landslide at 700m from Highway 97. Road closed. Detour in effect. Detour available via Highway 97 and Dale Lake Road. Next update time Wed Apr 23, 2025 at 2:00 PM PDT. Last updated Wed Oct 23 at 1:06 PM PDT. (DBC-27390)
Description: Landslide, road closed. Detour available via Highway 97 and Dale Lake Road.

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: Quesnel-Hixon Road, in both directions. Landslide at Cottonwood bridge. Road closed. Next update time Thu Apr 17, 2025 at 2:00 PM PDT. Last updated Wed Oct 23 at 2:46 PM PDT. (DBC-28386)
Description: Landslide at Cottonwood bridge. Road closed.

title: Other Roads
description: Johnston Bridge. Travel advisory in effect at Front St. In Quesnel. Johnston Bridge. Bridge is open to vehicles with gross vehicle weight rating of 10,000 kilograms or lower. Industrial traffic and heavy commercial traffic must detour via Plywood Rd and Maple Drive. Industrial traffic is not allowed to detour through Johnston Subdivision. Next update time Wed Apr 8, 2026 at 9:00 AM PDT. Last updated Thu Oct 17 at 6:39 AM PDT. (DBC-47311)

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: McKay Road, in both directions. Flooding at McKay Road. Road closed. Next update time Mon Dec 9 at 9:00 AM PDT. Last updated Thu Aug 8 at 9:26 AM PDT. (DBC-53013)
Description: Flooding at McKay Road. Road closed.

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: Canal Rd, in both directions. Construction work at Mt Norman Access Rd. From 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM PST daily. Watch for traffic control. Expect delays. Road closed. Night work will begin on November 13th. Next update time Fri Dec 13 at 10:00 AM PST. Last updated Fri Nov 29 at 11:37 AM PST. (DBC-61149)
Location: Canal Rd, in both directions at Mt Norman Access Rd
Description: Construction work. Watch for traffic control. Expect delays. Road closed. Night work will begin on November 13th.

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: Cave Road, in both directions. Landslide at Quesnel-Hixon Road. Road closed. Landslide on Cave Road. Next update time Tue Apr 1, 2025 at 10:00 AM PDT. Last updated Wed Oct 9 at 10:17 AM PDT. (DBC-67913)
Location: Cave Road, in both directions at Quesnel-Hixon Road
Description: Landslide on Cave Road. Road closed.

title: Other Roads
description: Red Bridge. Bridge closed between Athabasca Street and Lorne Street 1 km north of Kamloops. Bridge damaged. Detour in effect. Detour via Highway 5. Next update time Tue Dec 31 at 12:00 PM PDT. Last updated Fri Oct 25 at 7:55 AM PDT. (DBC-68412)
Location: Red Bridge, 1 km north of Kamloops
Description: Bridge closed between Athabasca Street and Lorne Street due to bridge damage. Detour in effect via Highway 5.

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: Pavilion Clinton Rd, in both directions. Travel advisory in effect between Clinton and Lillooet 60 km south of Lillooet. Road closed for the season. Pavilion-Clinton Rd is closed for the Winter. Next update time Fri May 16, 2025 at 10:00 AM PST. Last updated Tue Nov 12 at 9:23 AM PST. (DBC-70161)
Location: Pavilion Clinton Rd, in both directions between Clinton and Lillooet 60 km south of Lillooet
Description: Road closed for the season. Pavilion-Clinton Rd is closed for the Winter.

title: Upper Arrow Lake Ferry Both Directions
description: Upper Arrow Lake Ferry, in both directions. There will be required maintenance between Shelter Bay and Galena Bay. Starting Sat Dec 7 at 10:00 PM PST until Sun Dec 8 at 6:00 AM PST. Ferry will be out of service. Last sailing from Shelter Bay will be 9pm. Last sailing from Galena Bay will be 9:30pm. Next update time Sun Dec 8 at 6:00 AM PST. Last updated Mon Nov 25 at 11:18 AM PST. (DBC-70516)
Location: Upper Arrow Lake Ferry, in both directions
Description: There will be required maintenance between Shelter Bay and Galena Bay.

title: Upper Arrow Lake Ferry Both Directions
description: Upper Arrow Lake Ferry, in both directions. Crewing issue are expected between Shelter Bay and Galena Bay. Starting Wed Dec 4 at 11:00 PM PST until Thu Dec 5 at 5:00 AM PST. Ferry route will be closed. Last sailing from Shelter Bay will be 10 PM. Last sailing from Galena Bay will be 10:30 PM. Next update time Thu Dec 5 at 5:00 AM PST. Last updated Wed Dec 4 at 9:02 AM PST. (DBC-70702)
Location: Upper Arrow Lake Ferry, in both directions between Shelter Bay and Galena Bay
Description: Crewing issue expected, ferry route closed
